statements.text: In a not so ordinary place a entity suddonly appears.

he entity knows not who/what/where he is,
the only thing he knows is that that big blue thing is important.

A moment later portals open up and creatures come out,
they charge him, leaving him no other option than to fight to protect himself,
and the precious blue structure...
You can do this, keep at it!
whack em good! ... eh shoot em good!
They cannot see you if you stand behind a bush
